head.title: Chinese Women Suffer Under a Brutal System; 'Keep Your Mouth Shut'

hedline.hl1: Chinese Women Suffer Under a Brutal System; 'Keep Your Mouth Shut'

block.p: Re A. M. Rosenthal's July 7 column: I am a lawyer at a firm that handles immigration matters. Many of our clients are Chinese citizens, ranging from landbound peasants and factory workers to intellectuals and professionals. One thing they speak of in common is the ready threat of the Chinese Government to use force and coercion to maintain control over their minds and bodies.

Re A. M. Rosenthal's July 7 column: I am a lawyer at a firm that handles immigration matters. Many of our clients are Chinese citizens, ranging from landbound peasants and factory workers to intellectuals and professionals. One thing they speak of in common is the ready threat of the Chinese Government to use force and coercion to maintain control over their minds and bodies.
One man put it to me succinctly: "You learn fast. You keep your mouth shut or get your head broken."

The Chinese Government's purpose is not just the enforcement of a political orthodoxy, but to keep a hold on every aspect of life in China. Force is the key word to describe how the Chinese Government deals with its people. This will not change without pressure from the rest of the world. Otherwise, one-fifth of humanity will stay bottled up, the cork jammed in tight. JEFFREY E. BARON New York, July 15, 1992
